links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
formula: a(n) = gcd(n, lcm(dd(n))), where dd(n) is the first difference of divisors (ordered by size).
maple: A060766:= proc(n) local F; F:= sort(convert(numtheory:-divisors(n),list));   ilcm(op(F[2..-1] - F[1..-2])) end proc:seq(igcd(n,A060766(n)),n=2..100); # _Robert Israel_, Dec 20 2015
mathematica: Table[GCD[n, LCM @@ Differences@ Divisors@ n], {n, 2, 82}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 20 2015 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 25 2001
